title: American-Turkish activist killed in West Bank as Israeli forces opened fire
content: The IDF says it is investigating after Aysenur Ezgi Eygi was shot at a protest in Beita.
summary: The IDF says it is investigating after Aysenur Ezgi Eygi was shot at a protest in Beita.

title: Stranded astronauts' capsule heads home without them
content: Boeing's troubled spacecraft is returning empty while Nasa astronauts stay in space until February.
summary: Boeing's troubled spacecraft is returning empty while Nasa astronauts stay in space until February.

title: Boy, 14, and father in court over Georgia school shooting

title: Israeli forces pull out of Jenin after major operation

title: Trump's criminal sentencing delayed until after election

title: Bossa nova legend Sérgio Mendes dies
